::Annihilator::

Annihilator spins around in his chair, seeing Megatron and co. enter and 
deactivate the defences.

"Computer, activate internal defences! Shut all exit hatches! Blast doors 
close! Recognise unit Ra as enemy!"

Annihilator having a higher clearence than Ra, the computer obeys, trapping 
the invaders in the ship with every internal defence firing at them, 
including Ra in their fire.

Annihilator turns to Ra, grinning.

"Well, well, what have you got to say now, traitor?!"

With that, Annihilator pulls out two chainguns, opening fire on Ra while 
sending a distress call to Shuko.
